duties_responsibilities.duty: Understand contractual fleet needs and train company drivers according to job duties.
Manage and develop relationships with the drivers and subcontractors to increase overall driver productivity and retention.
Work closely with supervisors, drivers, customers, and other company departments to ensure company objectives are met.
Communicate quickly and proactively with planners, customer service, and drivers.
Manage revenue and mileage goals for each driver and the fleet as a whole.
Counsel and coach drivers who are not meeting metric goals/expectations.
Sell the loads to the drivers and ensure drivers acceptance of the load.
Update ETA’s, Total Mail, and manage phone calls and messages promptly.
Ensure driver safety, check in on all drivers daily, and assist with safe equipment.
Comply with company policies, procedures, and all applicable laws and regulations.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree, preferably in Logistics, Supply Chain, Transportation, Business, or any combination and experience.
